import React, { Component } from "react"; import Amplify from "@aws-amplify/core"; import { DataStore, Predicates } from "@aws-amplify/datastore"; import { Facility } from "../src/models"; class addFacility extends Component { state = {}; render() { const handleChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; async function handleSubmit() { console.log({ ...this.state }); await DataStore.save( new Facility({ facilityId: "JUMM/A/001", facilityType: "Shop", currentOwner: "Ahmed t", currentOwnerContact: "03894054", createdAt: "2020-01-09" }) ); } return ( <>
Register New Facility








handleSubmit} name="add" type="button" defaultValue="Add Facility" />
); } } export default addFacility;
